Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Thunder Head
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A terrifying sight at first the Thunderhead is a mechanoid that is clearly based on sharks from earth, this variant employs a very simple pair of machine gun turrets which fire two shots at once, running on a small hydroelectric generator this mechanoid is rather simple but still a great threat, it's sacks can hold living and mechanical units safely to be deployed elsewhere.
